summary: The Dennis and Lois Krisfalusy Act, introduced in the U.S. Senate on March 25, 2025, aims to amend title 38 of the United States Code. Specifically, it seeks to expand eligibility for memorial headstones and markers provided by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to include certain individuals who died before November 11, 1998. The bill was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
